name: Frankenshock
description:
Your castle is under siege! Thankfully, you have your undead army to baricade the doors, if you can keep their batteries charged! Use Dr. Victor's battery pack and lightning pylons to keep the creatures powered up. If too many of them fall, so will the castle! It's time to give you creations some shock therapy until you can survive the night!

WASD - Move Victor

Spacebar (When near a Pylon) - Gain a charge

Spacebar (When near a Monster) - Give the monster a charge

Credits:
